title: Item (NetHack: The Next Generation)
data:
[NetHack: The Next Generation](/wiki/NetHack:_The_Next_Generation "NetHack: The Next Generation"), a [variant](/wiki/Variant "Variant") of [NetHack 3.1.3](/wiki/NetHack_3.1.3 "NetHack 3.1.3"), added a large number of items; many of these have been incorporated into [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). One item, the "ring of health", later appeared in mainstream NetHack (starting in [3.3.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.0 "NetHack 3.3.0")) as the [ring of gain constitution](/wiki/Ring_of_gain_constitution "Ring of gain constitution").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Artifacts](#Artifacts)
- [2 Weapons](#Weapons)
- [3 Armor](#Armor)
- [4 Rings](#Rings)
- [5 Amulets](#Amulets)
- [6 Tools](#Tools)
- [7 Comestibles](#Comestibles)
- [8 Potions](#Potions)
- [9 Scrolls](#Scrolls)
- [10 Spellbooks](#Spellbooks)
- [11 Wands](#Wands)
- [12 References](#References)

## Artifacts

| Item                      | Symbol | Base type                                                                    | Alignment                                | Notes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ------------------------- | ------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Mumakbane                 | )      | [Long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword")                                  | [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral")       | Deals additional [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire") damage to [mumakil](/wiki/Mumak "Mumak").                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| Wormbiter                 | )      | [Crysknife](/wiki/Crysknife "Crysknife")                                     | [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral")       | Deals additional physical damage to [worms](/wiki/Worm "Worm").                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| Shocker                   | )      | [Electric sword](/wiki/Electric_sword "Electric sword")                      | [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral")       | Deals additional [electrical](/wiki/Shock "Shock") damage.                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Scales of the Dragon Lord | \[     | [Red dragon scale mail](/wiki/Red_dragon_scale_mail "Red dragon scale mail") | [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")       | Invoke for a dragon [breath](/wiki/Breath "Breath") attack.                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Burned Moth Relay         | (      | [Relay](/wiki/Relay "Relay")                                                 | [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned") | Gives [additional AC](/wiki/Protection "Protection") while carried.                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| Wand of Might             | /      | [Wand of wishing](/wiki/Wand_of_wishing "Wand of wishing")                   | [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned") | Unique wand of wishing found in the [Castle](/wiki/Castle "Castle").                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| Key of Access             | (      | [Skeleton key](/wiki/Skeleton_key "Skeleton key")                            | [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned") | Found on the Key Level. Invoke to [branchport](/wiki/Branchport "Branchport").                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| The NetHack Sources       | (      | [Pack of floppies](/wiki/Pack_of_floppies "Pack of floppies")                | [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral")       | [Quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for the [Geek](/wiki/Geek "Geek") role. Grants [searching](/wiki/Searching "Searching"), [ESP](/wiki/ESP "ESP"), and [regeneration](/wiki/Regeneration "Regeneration"). Invoke to [identify](/wiki/Identify "Identify"). |

## Weapons

| Item                                                                                                 | Symbol | Notes                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Electric sword](/wiki/Electric_sword "Electric sword")                                              | )      | Uses [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword") skill. Better damage and [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus than [katana](/wiki/Katana "Katana").                                  |
| [Tooth of an algolian suntiger](/wiki/Tooth_of_an_algolian_suntiger "Tooth of an algolian suntiger") | )      | Dropped by algolian suntigers. Uses [knife](/wiki/Knife "Knife") skill. Better damage and [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus than vanilla [crysknife](/wiki/Crysknife "Crysknife"). |

## Armor

| Item                                                                   | Symbol | Unidentified appearance | Notes |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ----------------------- | ----- |
| [Gauntlets of typing](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_typing "Gauntlets of typing") | ]      | Randomized              | AC 2  |

## Rings

| Item                                                                          | Symbol | Randomized appearance | Notes                                                                                                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [Ring of health](/wiki/Ring_of_gain_constitution "Ring of gain constitution") | =      | Randomized            | Equivalent to the current [ring of gain constitution](/wiki/Ring_of_gain_constitution "Ring of gain constitution"), which did not exist when NHTNG was made. |
| [Ring of timely backup](/wiki/Ring_of_timely_backup "Ring of timely backup")  | =      | Randomized            | Item on [The Computer Level](/wiki/The_Computer_Level "The Computer Level").                                                                                 |

## Amulets

| Item                                                                               | Symbol | Randomized appearance | Notes                                                                                                                                                        |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [Amulet of second chance](/wiki/Amulet_of_second_chance "Amulet of second chance") | "      | Randomized            | [Saves your life](/wiki/Amulet_of_lifesaving "Amulet of lifesaving") if you are killed, but resets health to value before the blow or event that killed you. |
| [Amulet of data storage](/wiki/Amulet_of_data_storage "Amulet of data storage")    | "      | Randomized            | Item on [The Computer Level](/wiki/The_Computer_Level "The Computer Level").                                                                                 |

## Tools

| Item                                                                                                            | Symbol | Randomized appearance                | Notes                                                                                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [Bag of digestion](/wiki/Bag_of_digestion "Bag of digestion")                                                   | (      | Bag                                  | "Eats" items in its inventory when [looted](/wiki/Loot "Loot") (like a cursed [bag of holding](/wiki/Bag_of_holding "Bag of holding")).                |
| [Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy](/wiki/Hitchhiker%27s_Guide_To_The_Galaxy "Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy") | (      | Highly-complicated electronic device | [Confuses](/wiki/Confuse "Confuse") the player or (if [hallucinating](/wiki/Hallucinating "Hallucinating")) gives false [rumors](/wiki/Rumor "Rumor"). |
| [diode](/wiki/Diode "Diode")                                                                                    | (      | Two-wired thing                      | Dropped by destroyed computers.                                                                                                                        |
| [transistor](/wiki/Transistor "Transistor")                                                                     | (      | Three-wired thing                    | Dropped by destroyed computers.                                                                                                                        |
| [IC](/wiki/IC "IC")                                                                                             | (      | Many-wired thing                     | Dropped by destroyed computers. Short for "integrated circuit".                                                                                        |
| [God-o-meter](/wiki/God-o-meter "God-o-meter")                                                                  | (      | Highly-complicated electronic device | If blessed, indicates if it is safe to [pray](/wiki/Pray "Pray"). If not blessed, increases [prayer timeout](/wiki/Prayer_timeout "Prayer timeout").   |
| [Relay](/wiki/Relay "Relay")                                                                                    | (      | Four-wired thing                     | Base item for the Burned Moth Relay.                                                                                                                   |
| [Pack of floppies](/wiki/Pack_of_floppies "Pack of floppies")                                                   | (      | Box containing little plastic cards  | When applied, has a chance of [confusing](/wiki/Confuse "Confuse") the player (if you draw "Microsoft Windows 3.1").                                   |
| [Bottle](/wiki/Bottle "Bottle")                                                                                 | (      | N/A                                  | Created sometimes when a [potion](/wiki/Potion "Potion") is quaffed. Used with a chemistry set to make potions.                                        |
| [Chemistry set](/wiki/Chemistry_set "Chemistry set")                                                            | (      | Box of obscure-looking glass devices | Used like a [magic marker](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker") to create [potions](/wiki/Potion "Potion").                                              |

## Comestibles

| Item                                                   | Symbol | Notes                                                                                        |
| ------------------------------------------------------ | ------ | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Hacker's Food](/wiki/Hacker%27s_Food "Hacker's Food") | %      | Gives 800 points of [nutrition](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition"); can be eaten in a single turn. |

## Potions

| Item                                                                                                                         | Symbol | Randomized appearance | Notes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Potion of extreme power](/wiki/Potion_of_extreme_power "Potion of extreme power")                                           | !      | Randomized            | If non-cursed, raises [HP](/wiki/HP "HP") and maximum by 1-10 points (1-20 if blessed). If cursed, reduces HP and maximum by 1-10 points.                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Potion of recovery](/wiki/Potion_of_recovery "Potion of recovery")                                                          | !      | Randomized            | Raises [HP](/wiki/HP "HP") to maximum. (The [potion of full healing](/wiki/Potion_of_full_healing "Potion of full healing") technically only gives 400 HP.)                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| [Potion of invulnerability](/wiki/Potion_of_invulnerability "Potion of invulnerability")                                     | !      | Randomized            | Gives temporary invulnerability to hit point loss.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| [Potion of heroism](/wiki/Potion_of_heroism "Potion of heroism")                                                             | !      | Randomized            |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Potion of cyanide](/wiki/Potion_of_cyanide "Potion of cyanide")                                                             | !      | Randomized            | [Sickens](/wiki/Sick "Sick") you, reduces [strength](/wiki/Strength "Strength") by up to 10 points, and costs a significant amount of health, depending on its BUC status. If thrown at a target or inhaled, reduces the target's health to 20% of its current value.                                                                                         |
| [Potion of radium](/wiki/Potion_of_radium "Potion of radium")                                                                | !      | Randomized            | [Sickens](/wiki/Sick "Sick") you. If thrown at a target or inhaled, reduces the target's health to 25% of its current value.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| [Potion of Jolt Cola](/wiki/Potion_of_Jolt_Cola "Potion of Jolt Cola")                                                       | !      | Randomized            | If non-cursed, cures [hallucination](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination") and heals 5 [HP](/wiki/HP "HP"). If blessed, has a 10% chance of granting a [level up](/wiki/Potion_of_gain_level "Potion of gain level"). If cursed, lowers health by 0-9 HP.                                                                                                      |
| [Potion of Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster](/wiki/Potion_of_Pan_Galactic_Gargle_Blaster "Potion of Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster") | !      | Randomized            | "You feel like having your brain smashed out by a slice of lemon wrapped around a large gold brick." [Confuses](/wiki/Confuses "Confuses") you for 6-42 turns; if cursed, has a 25% chance of lowering [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence"). If blessed, may cure [lycanthropy](/wiki/Lycanthropy "Lycanthropy") and restore maximum hit points. |

## Scrolls

| Item                                                                                                             | Symbol | Randomized appearance | Notes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [Scroll of mass murder](/wiki/Scroll_of_mass_murder "Scroll of mass murder")                                     | ?      | Randomized            | If non-cursed, allows the player to kill all monsters of a selected species on the same level. If cursed, summons 4-6 monsters of that species.                                                                                                  |
| [Scroll of undo genocide](/wiki/Scroll_of_undo_genocide "Scroll of undo genocide")                               | ?      | Randomized            | Re-enables generation of a [genocided](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide") species.                                                                                                                                                                       |
| [Scroll of reverse identify](/wiki/Scroll_of_reverse_identify "Scroll of reverse identify")                      | ?      | Randomized            | Reveals the appearance of a selected unidentified item, or the identity of an item with a specified random appearance. You do not need to have an item of the type in your inventory.                                                            |
| [Scroll of consecration](/wiki/Scroll_of_consecration "Scroll of consecration")                                  | ?      | Randomized            | Attempts to create an [altar](/wiki/Altar "Altar") at the player's location. If uncursed, it will be coaligned; if blessed, the player can choose its alignment; if cursed, it will be unaligned (dedicated to [Moloch](/wiki/Moloch "Moloch")). |
| [Scroll of root password detection](/wiki/Scroll_of_root_password_detection "Scroll of root password detection") | ?      | Randomized            | Item on [The Computer Level](/wiki/The_Computer_Level "The Computer Level").                                                                                                                                                                     |

## Spellbooks

| Item                                                                            | Symbol | Unidentified appearance | School     | Level | Notes                                                                                                            |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ----------------------- | ---------- | ----- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Spellbook of finger](/wiki/Spellbook_of_finger "Spellbook of finger")          | +      | Randomized              | Divination | 2     | Functions like [wand of probing](/wiki/Wand_of_probing "Wand of probing").                                       |
| [Spellbook of chemistry](/wiki/Spellbook_of_chemistry "Spellbook of chemistry") | +      | Randomized              | Divination | 1     | Nonfunctional "spell" that must be known in order to use a [chemistry set](/wiki/Chemistry_set "Chemistry set"). |

## Wands

| Item                                                       | Symbol | Randomized appearance | Notes                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| ---------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Wand of acid](/wiki/Wand_of_acid "Wand of acid")          | /      | Randomized            | Shoots an [acidic](/wiki/Acid "Acid") [ray](/wiki/Ray "Ray"), similar to a [yellow dragon](/wiki/Yellow_dragon "Yellow dragon")'s [breath](/wiki/Breath "Breath") attack.                                                                                                                                                                   |
| Wand of draining                                           | /      | Randomized            | Behaves differently from the [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") [wand of draining](/wiki/Wand_of_draining "Wand of draining"). This wand reduces the target's [HP](/wiki/HP "HP") by half of its maximum, reducing the user's current health by the same number of points. (Inspired by a wand in [Angband](/wiki/Angband "Angband").) |
| [Wand of wonder](/wiki/Wand_of_wonder "Wand of wonder")    | /      | Randomized            | Has a random effect.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Wand of bugging](/wiki/Wand_of_bugging "Wand of bugging") | /      | Randomized            | Item on [The Computer Level](/wiki/The_Computer_Level "The Computer Level"). Creates 1-6 bugs and/or heisenbugs.                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

## References

Spoiler by Sebastian Klein [\[1\]](http://www.juiblex.co.uk/nethack/TNG/nhtngsp.txt)
html:
Item (NetHack: The Next Generation)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack: The Next Generation, a variant of NetHack 3.1.3, added a large number of items; many of these have been incorporated into SlashTHEM. One item, the "ring of health", later appeared in mainstream NetHack (starting in 3.3.0) as the ring of gain constitution.

Contents

  • 1 Artifacts
  • 2 Weapons
  • 3 Armor
  • 4 Rings
  • 5 Amulets
  • 6 Tools
  • 7 Comestibles
  • 8 Potions
  • 9 Scrolls
  • 10 Spellbooks
  • 11 Wands
  • 12 References

Artifacts

Item Symbol Base type Alignment Notes
Mumakbane ) Long sword neutral Deals additional fire damage to mumakil.
Wormbiter ) Crysknife neutral Deals additional physical damage to worms.
Shocker ) Electric sword neutral Deals additional electrical damage.
Scales of the Dragon Lord [ Red dragon scale mail chaotic Invoke for a dragon breath attack.
Burned Moth Relay ( Relay unaligned Gives additional AC while carried.
Wand of Might / Wand of wishing unaligned Unique wand of wishing found in the Castle.
Key of Access ( Skeleton key unaligned Found on the Key Level. Invoke to branchport.
The NetHack Sources ( Pack of floppies neutral Quest artifact for the Geek role. Grants searching, ESP, and regeneration. Invoke to identify.

Weapons

Item Symbol Notes
Electric sword ) Uses long sword skill. Better damage and to-hit bonus than katana.
Tooth of an algolian suntiger ) Dropped by algolian suntigers. Uses knife skill. Better damage and to-hit bonus than vanilla crysknife.

Armor

Item Symbol Unidentified appearance Notes
Gauntlets of typing ] Randomized AC 2

Rings

Item Symbol Randomized appearance Notes
Ring of health = Randomized Equivalent to the current ring of gain constitution, which did not exist when NHTNG was made.
Ring of timely backup = Randomized Item on The Computer Level.

Amulets

Item Symbol Randomized appearance Notes
Amulet of second chance " Randomized Saves your life if you are killed, but resets health to value before the blow or event that killed you.
Amulet of data storage " Randomized Item on The Computer Level.

Tools

Item Symbol Randomized appearance Notes
Bag of digestion ( Bag "Eats" items in its inventory when looted (like a cursed bag of holding).
Hitchhiker's Guide To The Galaxy ( Highly-complicated electronic device Confuses the player or (if hallucinating) gives false rumors.
diode ( Two-wired thing Dropped by destroyed computers.
transistor ( Three-wired thing Dropped by destroyed computers.
IC ( Many-wired thing Dropped by destroyed computers. Short for "integrated circuit".
God-o-meter ( Highly-complicated electronic device If blessed, indicates if it is safe to pray. If not blessed, increases prayer timeout.
Relay ( Four-wired thing Base item for the Burned Moth Relay.
Pack of floppies ( Box containing little plastic cards When applied, has a chance of confusing the player (if you draw "Microsoft Windows 3.1").
Bottle ( N/A Created sometimes when a potion is quaffed. Used with a chemistry set to make potions.
Chemistry set ( Box of obscure-looking glass devices Used like a magic marker to create potions.

Comestibles

Item Symbol Notes
Hacker's Food % Gives 800 points of nutrition; can be eaten in a single turn.

Potions

Item Symbol Randomized appearance Notes
Potion of extreme power ! Randomized If non-cursed, raises HP and maximum by 1-10 points (1-20 if blessed). If cursed, reduces HP and maximum by 1-10 points.
Potion of recovery ! Randomized Raises HP to maximum. (The potion of full healing technically only gives 400 HP.)
Potion of invulnerability ! Randomized Gives temporary invulnerability to hit point loss.
Potion of heroism ! Randomized
Potion of cyanide ! Randomized Sickens you, reduces strength by up to 10 points, and costs a significant amount of health, depending on its BUC status. If thrown at a target or inhaled, reduces the target's health to 20% of its current value.
Potion of radium ! Randomized Sickens you. If thrown at a target or inhaled, reduces the target's health to 25% of its current value.
Potion of Jolt Cola ! Randomized If non-cursed, cures hallucination and heals 5 HP. If blessed, has a 10% chance of granting a level up. If cursed, lowers health by 0-9 HP.
Potion of Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster ! Randomized "You feel like having your brain smashed out by a slice of lemon wrapped around a large gold brick." Confuses you for 6-42 turns; if cursed, has a 25% chance of lowering intelligence. If blessed, may cure lycanthropy and restore maximum hit points.

Scrolls

Item Symbol Randomized appearance Notes
Scroll of mass murder ? Randomized If non-cursed, allows the player to kill all monsters of a selected species on the same level. If cursed, summons 4-6 monsters of that species.
Scroll of undo genocide ? Randomized Re-enables generation of a genocided species.
Scroll of reverse identify ? Randomized Reveals the appearance of a selected unidentified item, or the identity of an item with a specified random appearance. You do not need to have an item of the type in your inventory.
Scroll of consecration ? Randomized Attempts to create an altar at the player's location. If uncursed, it will be coaligned; if blessed, the player can choose its alignment; if cursed, it will be unaligned (dedicated to Moloch).
Scroll of root password detection ? Randomized Item on The Computer Level.

Spellbooks

Item Symbol Unidentified appearance School Level Notes
Spellbook of finger + Randomized Divination 2 Functions like wand of probing.
Spellbook of chemistry + Randomized Divination 1 Nonfunctional "spell" that must be known in order to use a chemistry set.

Wands

Item Symbol Randomized appearance Notes
Wand of acid / Randomized Shoots an acidic ray, similar to a yellow dragon's breath attack.
Wand of draining / Randomized Behaves differently from the SLASH'EM wand of draining. This wand reduces the target's HP by half of its maximum, reducing the user's current health by the same number of points. (Inspired by a wand in Angband.)
Wand of wonder / Randomized Has a random effect.
Wand of bugging / Randomized Item on The Computer Level. Creates 1-6 bugs and/or heisenbugs.

References

Spoiler by Sebastian Klein [1]

|If non-cursed, raises [[HP]] and maximum by 1-10 points (1-20 if blessed). If cursed, reduces HP and maximum by 1-10 points.
|-
|[[Potion of recovery]]
|{{red|!}}
|Randomized
|Raises [[HP]] to maximum. (The [[potion of full healing]] technically only gives 400 HP.)
|-
|[[Potion of invulnerability]]
|{{cyan|!}}
|Randomized
|Gives temporary invulnerability to hit point loss.
|-
|[[Potion of heroism]]
|{{brown|!}}
|Randomized
|
|-
|[[Potion of cyanide]]
|{{red|!}}
|Randomized
|[[Sick]]ens you, reduces [[strength]] by up to 10 points, and costs a significant amount of health, depending on its BUC status. If thrown at a target or inhaled, reduces the target's health to 20% of its current value.
|-
|[[Potion of radium]]
|{{red|!}}
|Randomized
|[[Sick]]ens you. If thrown at a target or inhaled, reduces the target's health to 25% of its current value.
|-
|[[Potion of Jolt Cola]]
|{{brown|!}}
|Randomized
|If non-cursed, cures [[hallucination]] and heals 5 [[HP]]. If blessed, has a 10% chance of granting a [[Potion of gain level|level up]]. If cursed, lowers health by 0-9 HP.
|-
|[[Potion of Pan Galactic Gargle Blaster]]
|{{white|!}}
|Randomized
|"You feel like having your brain smashed out by a slice of lemon wrapped around a large gold brick." [[Confuses]] you for 6-42 turns; if cursed, has a 25% chance of lowering [[intelligence]]. If blessed, may cure [[lycanthropy]] and restore maximum hit points.
|}

==Scrolls==
{|class="prettytable sortable"
!Item
!Symbol
!Randomized appearance
!Notes
|-
|[[Scroll of mass murder]]
|{{white|?}}
|Randomized
|If non-cursed, allows the player to kill all monsters of a selected species on the same level. If cursed, summons 4-6 monsters of that species.
|-
|[[Scroll of undo genocide]]
|{{white|?}}
|Randomized
|Re-enables generation of a [[genocide]]d species.
|-
|[[Scroll of reverse identify]]
|{{white|?}}
|Randomized
|Reveals the appearance of a selected unidentified item, or the identity of an item with a specified random appearance. You do not need to have an item of the type in your inventory.
|-
|[[Scroll of consecration]]
|{{white|?}}
|Randomized
|Attempts to create an [[altar]] at the player's location. If uncursed, it will be coaligned; if blessed, the player can choose its alignment; if cursed, it will be unaligned (dedicated to [[Moloch]]).
|-
|[[Scroll of root password detection]]
|{{white|?}}
|Randomized
|Item on [[The Computer Level]].
|}

|[[Wand of acid]]
|{{cyan|/}}
|Randomized

|-
|Wand of draining
|{{cyan|/}}
|Randomized
|Behaves differently from the [[SLASH'EM]] [[wand of draining]]. This wand reduces the target's [[HP]] by half of its maximum, reducing the user's current health by the same number of points. (Inspired by a wand in [[Angband]].)

|{{cyan|/}}
|Randomized

|-
